text: Ozan Yılmaz (born 1 February 1988) is a Turkish-German footballer who plays as a midfielder for TSV Marl-Hüls, where he also is the assistant manager. ==References== ==External links== * Profile at DFB.de * Profile at kicker.de * Profile at TFF.org Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish footballers Category:German footballers Category:German people of Turkish descent Category:Turkey youth international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:SG Wattenscheid 09 players Category:SC Fortuna Köln players Category:Schwarz-Weiß Essen players Category:SpVgg Erkenschwick players Category:TSV Marl-Hüls players Category:3. Liga players Category:Regionalliga players
title: Ozan Yılmaz
